last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: Frannie must face the music. Will the shocking truth surrounding the Benhams’ murders and Langton’s experiments finally be revealed?

name: The Confessions of Frannie Langton
overview: Based on Sara Collins’ award-winning novel of the same name, which is set against the dazzling opulence of Georgian London, this powerful drama follows the eponymous Frannie’s journey from a Jamaican plantation to the grand Mayfair mansion of celebrated scientist George Benham and his exquisitely beautiful wife, Madame Marguerite Benham.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: London, 1826: When prominent society couple Mr. and Mrs Benham are found stabbed to death, all eyes turn to their maid, Frannie.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Frannie and Madame’s relationship develops. Meanwhile, horrific experiments conducted at the Paradise plantation come to light.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Frannie and Madame’s relationship comes under threat as jealousies flare in the Benham house, and Madame’s own issues worsen.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Frannie must face the music. Will the shocking truth surrounding the Benhams’ murders and Langton’s experiments finally be revealed?
